website_summaries.verdict: A premium hook that allows you to safely climb a ladder to access roof.
pros: Instantly attaches ladder to peak of steep roof
Intended for use with D-rung and round-rung ladders
Equipped with reinforced rod around hook for extra strength
cons: Can be hard to tighten hook to ladder

customer_reviews.title: I found this product to be potentially unsafe. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be potentially unsafe. It does not tighten well to a ladder. I had to take time to make a cross bar to keep it from sliding side to side on the ladder. It could throw my balance off. The wing nut is not a safe fastener. I am replacing it with a lock washer and real nut. I find this product to need what I call "after market engineering". I am also going to fasten a rope to it down the other side of the roof to be sure it doesn't come off the roof.
customer_reviews.author: robfra611

customer_reviews.title: Needs a set screw
customer_reviews.text: Product works good. I used it on a little giant ladder. I had to drill and tap a hole in the bracket to install a set screw so it wouldn't slide left or right on my ladder. The manufacturer should do this and put a thumb screw in. The thumb screw doesn't need to be tight. It just needs to make contact with the ladder.

customer_reviews.title: A Lifesaver!

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to modify it to work.

Also, no installation nor instruction documentation was included

There isn't much "axial" adjustment of the tightening portion, so if your ladder rungs are too close together, it could pose a problem. I did find that I could attach a safety rope to it as well, so if you did end up sliding, perhaps the hook would hold and it would stop your fall. Obviously not what it was intended for, so use your best judgement.

product_meta.title: ACRO BUILDING SYSTEMS 11082 Acro Roof Ridge Ladder Hook with Fixed Wheel & Swivel Bar
product_meta.description: Turns a ladder into roof climbing aide. Just attach to a flat ladder or one section of an extension ladder; then roll up to peek of roof and flip over for hook to grab. Reinforced roof ridge ladder hook with fixed wheel and swivel bar. Fits D-rung and round rung ladders. Easily installs on steep pitch roofs. . 300 lb capacity. Yellow. No. 11082: Fits Models: D-Rung and Round Rung, Material: Metal, Features: Wheel, Pkg Qty: 1
